com.craftar
Class CraftARTracking

java.lang.Object
  com.craftar.CraftARTracking

public abstract class CraftARTracking
extends java.lang.Object

Module that manages the AR experience allowing to add AR items and contents and rendering the contents in the camera preview.

Constructor Summary
CraftARTracking()
           
 
Method Summary
abstract  void addItem(CraftARItemAR item)
          Add a CraftARItemAR to track.
abstract  void removeAllItems()
          Remove all AR items and contents from the tracking.
abstract  void removeItem(CraftARItemAR item)
          Remove a CraftARItemAR from the list of tracked references (This item will not be longer tracked).
abstract  boolean startTracking()
          Call startTracking after CraftARSDK#init().
abstract  boolean stopTracking()
          Call stopTracking to stop tracking.

equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
 

Constructor Detail

CraftARTracking

public CraftARTracking()
Method Detail

startTracking

public abstract boolean startTracking()
Call startTracking after CraftARSDK#init().

stopTracking

public abstract boolean stopTracking()
Call stopTracking to stop tracking. You can call startTracking() at any moment to resume. Note that calling stopTracking will not affect the 90 seconds limitation for the free version.

addItem

public abstract void addItem(CraftARItemAR item)
                      throws CraftARSDKException
Add a CraftARItemAR to track. Note that you can track up to 5 references simultaneously. For the free version, a maximum of 4 ARItems in the app's lifetime is allowed.

Throws:
CraftARSDKException

removeItem

public abstract void removeItem(CraftARItemAR item)
Remove a CraftARItemAR from the list of tracked references (This item will not be longer tracked).

removeAllItems

public abstract void removeAllItems()
Remove all AR items and contents from the tracking. This method MUST NOT be called before calling stopTracking().
